name: Galactic Gardening
description:
This Game is supposed to be a plant puzzling game, in which you have to find optimal condidtion for each plant to get the maximum number of points. You cannot just arrange the plants randomly, since not every plant is a nice neighbor to others. Therefore you have to study the needs and effects of each plant and find the best arrangement/assembly.

The plants work similiar to a card deck and you can get them from the moving belt on the left screen. You can only get the topmost plant. But dont worry, you can also shift the whole plant queue as you like.

Controls:
Move: WASD / LEFT StickUse: Space / A-Buton
Quit: ESC

Reset-Button: Go to the reset panel (ingame) and press "use" button. The level will be resetted.

Finish-Button: Go to the other panel (ingame) and press "use" button. Your score will be calculated and you will either proceed to next level or have to find a better solution.
